definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: The bottom? Baghdad once again comes in at 215.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克的巴格达无疑再次中标。

sentences.english: Many Arab states have already begun to open embassies in Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 许多阿拉伯国家已经开始在巴格达建立使馆。

sentences.english: A car-bomb attack scene in one of the streets in Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 巴格达街头一处汽车炸弹袭击现场。

sentences.english: Baghdad is one of the great cities of the Moslem world.
sentences.chinese: 巴格达是穆斯林世界中一个伟大的城市。

sentences.english: He is scheduled to visit Baghdad, Iraq, on Nov. 1.
sentences.chinese: 他还计划在11月1日访问伊拉克的巴格达。

sentences.english: Among those killed was the top U.N. official in Iraq - Sergio Vieira de Mello.
sentences.chinese: 丧生的人员中包括联合国驻巴格达最高官员德梅洛。

sentences.english: Baghdad residents walk past a new clothing store for men in the Karrada market area.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉达市场，巴格达居民走过一家新的男士服装店。

sentences.english: Marin Cilic vs. Marcos Baghdatis would be a highlight of the third round.
sentences.chinese: 第三轮，西里奇与巴格达蒂斯是一亮点。

sentences.english: The man Muntathar al-Zaidi was on guilty by the court in Baghdad of attacking a foreign head of state.
sentences.chinese: 扎伊迪因向外国领导人攻击而被巴格达法院起诉。

sentences.english: Five American soldiers died in Baghdad earlier this year in a shooting by one of their comrades at a combat stress clinic.
sentences.chinese: 今年早期，五名美兵在巴格达被长官射死。

sentences.english: Authorities have imposed a three-day curfew in the capital to contain the clashes.
sentences.chinese: 首都巴格达已开始实施为期三天的宵禁以遏制冲突。

sentences.english: And the flanking operation south of Baghdad is already in full swing.
sentences.chinese: 而且巴格达南部的侧翼行动正如火如荼。

sentences.english: The bombing of Baghdad demonstrated the awesome power and might of the US military.
sentences.chinese: 对巴格达的轰炸向全世界宣示了美国强大的军事力量。

sentences.english: Iraqi militiamen from the ruling Ba'ath party shout anti-US slogans in a trench in the city of Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 一伊拉克士兵在巴格达战壕里呼喊着反美口号。

sentences.english: It's something I heard in Baghdad a couple of times and it stuck with me, that phrase, the hurt locker.
sentences.chinese: 我在巴格达听到好多次，它缠着我。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people have been killed in a stampede during a Shi'ite religious ceremony in Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 数百人死于挤踏在巴格达稀客人的宗教庆典期间。

definition: Bokhara or Bukhara city in Uzbekistan
Najaf (city in Iraq, a Shia holy city)
(loanword) caliph/also written 哈利發|哈利发[ha1 li4 fa1]
Tabriz city in northwest Iran, capital of Iranian East Azerbaijan
Tripoli, capital of Libya/Tripoli, city in north Lebanon
